Title: Cold Snap
Game Text: Absolute Zero deals himself 3 fire damage. Absolute Zero deals each non-Hero target 1 cold damage.
Flavor Text: Looks like you should have flown south for the winter!

Title: Conductive Installation
Game Text: Draw 1 card. Collect 1 Item card. You may play 1 card.
Flavor Text: It's a nice change of pace to not be slamming this thing together in a rush.

Title: Coolant Blast
Game Text: POWER: Absolute Zero deals 1 non-Hero target X cold damage, where X is the amount of fire damage dealt to Absolute Zero this turn.
Flavor Text: Once in a while, you just gotta improvise!

Title: Cryo-Field Projector
Game Text: +1 to cold damage dealt to Absolute Zero. -1 to fire damage dealt to Absolute Zero. START PHASE Absolute Zero deals himself 3 fixed fire damage. Destroy this card.
Flavor Text: It's not quite home frigid home, but it'll do in a pinch.

Title: Desperate Deployment
Game Text: Summon 1 Item card. Absolute Zero deals himself 1 fire damage and 1 cold damage.
Flavor Text: You are incomplete. Feeble without your suit. In chasing your humanity, you have lost your identity.

Title: Focused Apertures
Game Text: +1 to cold damage dealt by Absolute Zero.
Flavor Text: I was hesitant when you said 'new and improved', but I can appreciate this level of precision.

Title: Frost-Bound Drain
Game Text: Absolute Zero deals 1 non-Hero target 3 cold damage. Absolute Zero deals himself 3 fire damage.
Flavor Text: Too cold? Welcome to my life.

Title: Fueled Freeze
Game Text: Destroy up to 3 Ongoing cards. Absolute Zero deals X targets 3 cold damage, where X is the number of Ongoing cards destroyed by this card.
Flavor Text: I'm genuinely having a bad time here. Just trying to spread the misery around.

Title: High-Yield Coolant Tanks
Game Text: END PHASE Either use 1 power or draw 1 card.
Flavor Text: This new super-chilled coolant will cut your upper temperature ceiling by about a hundred degrees!

Title: Hoarfire
Game Text: Absolute Zero deals 1 target 2 cold damage. Absolute Zero deals 1 different target 2 fire damage. Absolute Zero deals himself 1 cold damage and 1 fire damage.
Flavor Text: Yeah, it's too damn hot, but it's a change of pace from being cold all the time. This'll eventually kill me, but I'm not going alone!
Attribution: Absolute Zero, Tome of the Bizarre Vol. 3 #13

Title: Ice Shield
Game Text: After this card is played, select 1 target. That target is immune to damage. When this card is destroyed, you may draw 1 card and play 1 card. START PHASE Destroy this card.
Flavor Text: You saved a lot of lives today. I know we haven't always seen eye to eye, but you're an absolute hero in my book.

Title: Isothermic Transducer
Game Text: After this card is played, you may play 1 card. After Absolute Zero is dealt fire damage, Absolute Zero deals 1 target that much cold damage.
Flavor Text: It flies in the face of the laws of thermodynamics, but I cannot argue -- fire does get all weird around you!

Title: Modular Repair
Game Text: Salvage 1 Item card. You may play 1 card. Absolute Zero deals himself 1 fire damage and 1 cold damage.
Flavor Text: Doc's not gonna love it, but it's this or burn!

Title: Null-Point Calibration Unit
Game Text: After this card is played, you may play 1 card. Whenever Absolute Zero would be dealt cold damage, he regains that much HP instead.
Flavor Text: Cold is all a matter of perspective.

Title: Still Life
Game Text: After this card is played, select 1 target. That target cannot deal damage. When this card is destroyed, you may draw 1 card and play 1 card. START PHASE Destroy this card.
Flavor Text: Sure, it's not my best work, but you gotta work with what you've got. I'm no Michelangelo over here.

Title: Thermal Shockwave
Game Text: POWER: Absolute Zero deals up to 3 targets 1 cold damage each. Then, Absolute Zero deals himself X fire damage, where X is the amount of cold damage dealt by Absolute Zero this turn.
Flavor Text: What's the matter? You boys got cold feet?

Title: Akpunku's Drum
Game Text: POWER: Activate the ACCOMPANY of 1 Rhythm card. Then, activate the PERFORM of 1 Rhythm card.
Flavor Text: How can this mere mortal counter my despair?!

Title: Alacritous Subdominant
Game Text: PERFORM 1 Hero may play 1 card. ACCOMPANY You may use 1 power. If you do, put this card on the top of your deck.
Flavor Text: I feel the timbre of your verse flowing through me, shaping this construct like nothing I've ever manifested before!

Title: Arcane Cadence
Game Text: Reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. Draw 1 of them, replace 1, discard 1, bury 1, and play 1.
Flavor Text: I am pulled by magical forces beyond the knowledge of man. Nature, Void, blood... all are my domain!
Attribution: The Argent Adept, Virtuoso of the Void Vol. 2 #65

Title: Cedistic Dissonant
Game Text: PERFORM Destroy 1 Instrument card. If you do, you may destroy 1 non-character card. ACCOMPANY 1 ally may play 1 card.
Flavor Text: Power for power. Be no more.

Title: Counterpoint Bulwark
Game Text: PERFORM Select up to 3 targets. Until your START PHASE, -1 damage dealt to those targets. ACCOMPANY Up to 3 Heroes may draw 1 card each.
Flavor Text: She seeks to be your undoing on an ethereal level. Hold fast. You can overcome this curse.
Attribution: The Argent Adept, Mystery Comics Vol. 2 #302

Title: Drake's Pipes
Game Text: POWER: Activate the PERFORM of 1 Melody card. Then, activate the PERFORM of 1 other card.
Flavor Text: With the creation of my own instrument, I become the latest in the line of Virtuosos of the Void: the Argent Adept!

Title: Eydisar's Horn
Game Text: POWER: Activate the PERFORM of 1 Melody card. Then, activate 1 ACCOMPANY.
Flavor Text: Come forth! Halt your battles in Valhalla and stand strong against these forces of evil!

Title: Inspiring Supertonic
Game Text: PERFORM 1 Hero may use 1 power. ACCOMPANY The Argent Adept regains 2 HP.
Flavor Text: Sing more power into my storm, musical magician! That dread titan won't be able to weather such an onslaught.

Title: Instrumental Conjuration
Game Text: Summon 1 Instrument card. You may play 1 card.
Flavor Text: Virtuosos of the ages, lend me your strength!
Attribution: The Argent Adept, Virtuoso of the Void Vol. 1 #145

Title: Inventive Preparation
Game Text: PERFORM Each Hero reveals the top card of their deck, then replaces it or discards it. Then, 1 Hero may draw 2 cards. ACCOMPANY Discover 1 Ongoing card.
Flavor Text: I hear, I see now. My faith is my strength, but my faith need not endure in solitude. My friends, too, give me strength.

Title: Musaragni's Harp
Game Text: POWER: Activate the PERFORM of 1 Harmony card. Then, activate the ACCOMPANY of 1 Harmony card.
Flavor Text: Its strings can play as quietly as a mouse, or as loud as a lion!
Attribution: The Argent Adept, Toll of Destiny #2

Title: Polyphonic Flare
Game Text: The Argent Adept deals himself 2 fixed energy damage. Either use 1 power or draw 2 cards.
Flavor Text: So long as your essence persists in any realm, you shall never be free of me!
Attribution: Bal'Teranerach, Virtuoso of the Void Vol. 2 #100

Title: Rhapsody of Vigor
Game Text: PERFORM Up to 5 targets regain 2 HP each.
Flavor Text: Prepare yourselves. The worst is yet to come.
Attribution: The Argent Adept, Prime Wardens Vol. 1 #1

Title: Sarabande of Destruction
Game Text: PERFORM Destroy 1 Ongoing card or 1 target with 2 or fewer HP.
Flavor Text: You cannot return! Your base machinations shall fail!
Attribution: The Argent Adept, Virtuoso of the Void Vol. 1 #152

Title: Scherzo of Frost and Flame
Game Text: PERFORM The Argent Adept deals 1 target 2 cold damage. Then, The Argent Adept may deal 1 different target 2 fire damage.
Flavor Text: A touch of the elements to keep foes at bay.
Attribution: The Argent Adept, Prime Wardens Vol. 2 #17

Title: Silver Shadow
Game Text: Activate 1 ACCOMPANY. You may either draw 1 card or play 1 card.
Flavor Text: Music of the Void, course through my lungs and give life to my refrain! I sing you into creation!
Attribution: The Argent Adept, Virtuoso of the Void Vol. 2 #38

Title: Syncopated Onslaught
Game Text: PERFORM Select up to 3 targets. Until your START PHASE, +1 damage dealt by those targets. ACCOMPANY The Argent Adept deals 1 target 1 irreducible sonic damage.
Flavor Text: Ah! It is good to do a haka with such fine accompaniment!

Title: Telamon's Lyra
Game Text: POWER: Either activate the PERFORM of 1 Harmony card and activate the ACCOMPANY of 1 Rhythm card, or activate the PERFORM of 1 Rhythm card and activate the ACCOMPANY of 1 Harmony card.
Flavor Text: Back! Begone! I know not how I brought you into this world, but I shall surely send you from it!

Title: Vernal Sonata
Game Text: Each Hero target regains 1 HP. Each Hero may put 1 card from their trash on top of their deck.
Flavor Text: Don't get too comfortable. We're not out of the woods yet.
Attribution: The Argent Adept, Prime Wardens Vol. 2 #29

Title: Xu's Bell
Game Text: POWER: Either activate 1 PERFORM or activate the ACCOMPANY of up to 2 different cards.
Flavor Text: Hey, you can't touch that! It's a priceless artifact!
Attribution: Dr. Blake Washington, Jr., Toll of Destiny #1

Title: Adhesive Foam Grenade
Game Text: Environment cards cannot be played. START PHASE Destroy this card.
Flavor Text: I was worried when you took a shot at Lady Liberty, soldier, but good work saving the day!

Title: Emergency Shielding
Game Text: When this card is destroyed, Bunker regains 2 HP. REACTION: -2 to the damage Bunker would be dealt. Then, if Bunker is still dealt damage, destroy this card.
Flavor Text: We've got some new damage reduction protocols for you. Could be literally life saving. Can't go losing my best soldier, now can I?

Title: Expendable Power Bank
Game Text: PLAY PHASE You may put 1 card from your trash under 1 Ordnance card in play. If you do, put this card under 1 Ordnance card in play. END PHASE Put the top card of your deck under 1 Ordnance card in play.
Flavor Text: Sure, it's a bit of a weak point, but the other alternative is fewer bells and whistles, and we can't have that!

Title: Flak Cannon
Game Text: POWER: Destroy up to 2 cards under this card. Each time you destroy 1 card this way, Bunker deals 1 target 3 projectile damage. START PHASE Put the top card of your deck under this card.
Flavor Text: Not going to climb out of your fancy tin can and give your old squadmate a hug? What, am I below your station?

Title: Gatling Gun
Game Text: START PHASE Put the top card of your deck under this card. END PHASE Destroy up to 3 cards under this card. Each time you destroy 1 card this way, Bunker deals 1 target 1 projectile damage.
Flavor Text: I provide my own suppressive fire.

Title: Grenade Launcher
Game Text: POWER: Destroy up to 2 cards under this card. Each time you destroy 1 card this way, Bunker deals 3 targets 2 fire damage each. START PHASE Put the top card of your deck under this card.
Flavor Text: Not letting me draw a bead on you? That's a smart idea, provided I don't have any explosives.

Title: LIDAR Intel
Game Text: After any non-Hero target is played, you may draw 1 card. POWER: Reveal and replace the top card of 1 deck. Draw 1 card.
Flavor Text: You think you're sneaky, dontcha? I see you...

Title: Mounted AP Gun
Game Text: POWER: Destroy 2 cards under this card. If you do, Bunker deals 1 target 6 irreducible projectile damage. START PHASE Put the top card of your deck under this card.
Flavor Text: Stop all your fretting. They're not getting away.

Title: Omni-Cannon
Game Text: POWER: Destroy all cards under this card. Bunker deals 1 target X energy damage, where X is the number of cards destroyed this way times 2. START PHASE Put the top card of your deck under this card.
Flavor Text: Scrambling antimatter particles in a graviton launcher controls and directs a steady stream of hyper-excited leptons. Translation: Big gun go boom.

Title: Piston Punch
Game Text: Bunker deals 1 target 3 melee damage. If that damage destroys a target, put this card under 1 Ordnance card in play.
Flavor Text: Ooh, look at the big army man and his fancy suit built for combat instead of just making sure he doesn't die.

Title: Recharge Mode
Game Text: You cannot use powers. START PHASE Destroy this card. DRAW PHASE You may draw 4 additional cards. END PHASE Put any number of cards from hand under any Ordnance cards in play.
Flavor Text: It's a fine plan, and I'm all for it. But I'm going to need a lot more power.

Title: Tactical Command
Game Text: 1 ally uses 1 power. Damage dealt by that ally with that power is irreducible.
Flavor Text: He doesn't often speak up, but when he does, it's well worth listening.

Title: Turret Mode
Game Text: +1 damage dealt by Bunker. START PHASE Destroy this card. POWER PHASE You may use 2 additional powers this phase.
Flavor Text: BUDDABUDDABUDDABUDDABUDDABUDDA BUDDABUDDABUDDABUDDABUDDABUDDA BUDDABUDDABUDDABUDDABUDDABUDDA BUDDABUDDABUDDABUDDABUDDABUDDA BUDDABUDDABUDDABUDDABUDDABUDDA BUDDABUDDABUDDABUDDABUDDABUDDA

Title: Upgrade Mode
Game Text: After this card is played, summon 1 Item card. You cannot use powers. START PHASE Destroy this card. END PHASE Play up to 2 cards.
Flavor Text: No, it's not like driving a car. OK, it's like driving a car blindfolded with shoes on your hands and also you're late.

Title: Augmented Ally
Game Text: Play this card next to a Hero character. POWER PHASE This Hero may discard 1 card. If they do, they may use 1 additional power this phase.
Flavor Text: I am used to fighting with you, my friend, but not with me as well!

Title: Autonomous Blade
Game Text: Play this card next to a Hero target. After that target deals damage for the first time each turn, this card deals 1 target 2 energy damage.
Flavor Text: Stand and fight or give up now! You cannot escape justice.

Title: Conservation of Energy
Game Text: After any Construct card is destroyed, you may draw 1 card. START PHASE You may play 1 Construct card from your trash. If you do, destroy this card.
Flavor Text: Your command over the energy... the stability of your creations... I make up the difference with raw power!

Title: Construct Cataclysm
Game Text: Destroy any number of Construct cards. Captain Cosmic either deals 1 target X irreducible energy damage, or deals up to X targets 3 energy damage each, where X is the number of Construct cards in your trash.
Flavor Text: Er, heads up, chaps. Getting a little extra showy here.

Title: Cosmic Crest
Game Text: -1 damage dealt to Captain Cosmic. POWER: Play or discover 1 Construct card.
Flavor Text: Who put me in charge? No one. But someone must stand for the world.

Title: Cosmic Weapon
Game Text: Play this card next to a Hero character. They gain this power: POWER: This Hero deals 1 target 3 energy damage.
Flavor Text: This temporary blade will last longer than the foes we face!

Title: Destructive Response
Game Text: After any Construct card is destroyed, Captain Cosmic deals up to 3 targets 1 energy damage each.
Flavor Text: Certainly are a lot of you... well, come and get me.

Title: Dynamic Siphon
Game Text: Play this card next to a Hero character. They gain this reaction: REACTION: Use 1 power.
Flavor Text: A duet? We will play the anthems of the heavens!
Attribution: The Argent Adept, Prime Wardens Vol. 1 #39

Title: Energy Bracer
Game Text: Play this card next to a Hero target. -1 damage dealt to that Hero target.
Flavor Text: I will not fight for their homeworld, but I will fight for the good of the galaxy.

Title: Harsh Offense
Game Text: Captain Cosmic deals 1 target 3 energy damage. If that target is still in play, draw 2 cards.
Flavor Text: You bring out the worst in me. I shall return the favor.

Title: Heart of Gold
Game Text: POWER: Discard up to 3 cards. 1 Hero draws up to X cards. You may play up to X Construct cards. X is the number of cards you discarded this phase.
Flavor Text: I just really need someone to help me here. There has to be some justice in the galaxy, right?

Title: Potent Disruption
Game Text: Destroy 1 Construct card. If you do, Captain Cosmic deals 1 target 5 irreducible energy damage.
Flavor Text: You foolish Earthling! You will fall before the might of EYEYYEYYEAYEYAYAEERRGHH!!

Title: Unflagging Animation
Game Text: -1 damage dealt to Construct cards. START PHASE Either discard 1 card or destroy this card. END PHASE The Construct card with the lowest HP regains 2 HP.
Flavor Text: I know little of your people, but I understand fear, and innocent lives in danger. I will keep you safe. I swear it.

Title: Vitality Conduit
Game Text: Play this card next to a Hero target. START PHASE That target regains 2 HP.
Flavor Text: Careful, m'dear! I know you're quite capable, but that fellow looks rather intent on your destruction!

Title: Wounding Buffer
Game Text: Play this card next to a Hero character. They gain this reaction: REACTION: This card deals the attacker 3 energy damage.
Flavor Text: Order! Order! I demand you stop all this nonsense at once! I was attempting to have a real trial here!

Title: Absolution
Game Text: POWER: Fanatic deals 1 target 3 melee damage. Then, if Fanatic is at 10 or fewer HP, Fanatic deals 1 target 2 fire damage and 2 radiant damage.
Flavor Text: Absolution you are called, and absolution you shall deliver.

Title: Aegis of Resurrection
Game Text: When Fanatic would be reduced to 0 HP, prevent that damage and destroy this card. When this card is destroyed, Fanatic regains 10 HP.
Flavor Text: No mere mortal wound can destroy the form of God's chosen.

Title: Anoint Allies
Game Text: +1 damage dealt by your allies. If Fanatic has 10 or fewer HP, +1 damage dealt by Fanatic. START PHASE Either destroy this card or Fanatic deals herself 3 fixed psychic damage.
Flavor Text: The faith practices of you humans are so unlike those of Maerynians, yet I still appreciate your blessing.

Title: Brutal Censure
Game Text: After this card is played, select a non-character target. That card has no game text. START PHASE Either destroy this card or Fanatic deals herself 3 fixed psychic damage.
Flavor Text: Know the error of thine ways.

Title: Consecrated Ground
Game Text: Destroy 1 Ongoing card. Fanatic deals up to 3 targets 1 radiant damage each.
Flavor Text: Your dark rituals have no sway in this holy place.

Title: Divine Sacrifice
Game Text: Fanatic deals herself up to 3 radiant damage. Fanatic deals X targets 3 radiant damage each, where X is the amount of damage dealt to Fanatic this turn.
Flavor Text: Face me and tremble!

Title: End of Days
Game Text: START PHASE Destroy all cards other than this card, character cards, and Relic cards. Then, destroy this card.
Flavor Text: The blight upon this land be cleansed!

Title: Final Dive
Game Text: Destroy 1 non-character target with 4 or fewer HP. Fanatic deals 1 target X projectile damage, where X is the destroyed target's HP before it was destroyed.
Flavor Text: Meet thy maker.
Attribution: Fanatic, Tome of the Bizarre Vol. 3 #9

Title: Holy Nova
Game Text: Fanatic deals each non-Hero target 1 radiant damage. Each Hero target regains 1 HP. Then, if Fanatic has 10 or fewer HP, Fanatic deals up to 3 targets 2 radiant damage each.
Flavor Text: You can hide in the sun 'til you see the light.

Title: Prayer of Desperation
Game Text: Reveal the top 4 cards of your deck. Put any Item or Ongoing cards revealed this way in your hand. Discard the other revealed cards. Then, if Fanatic has 10 or fewer HP, play up to 2 cards.
Flavor Text: Let this not be the last breath your servant draws.

Title: Righteous Rebuke
Game Text: POWER: Fanatic deals 1 target 2 radiant damage. Then, if Fanatic has 10 or fewer HP, Fanatic deals up to 3 targets 2 radiant damage each and regains 2 HP.
Flavor Text: The prayers and rituals of believer have ne'er wracked my body with such pain before!

Title: Rosary of the Mysteries
Game Text: POWER: Shuffle your trash into your deck. Discard 5 cards. Draw 5 cards. Then, if Fanatic has 10 or fewer HP, Fanatic regains up to 5 HP.
Flavor Text: Ah! Connecting to a spiritual realm using an artifact of power! Not much of a musical instrument though.
Attribution: The Argent Adept, Prime Wardens Vol. 1 #129

Title: Sacrosanct Martyr
Game Text: POWER: Fanatic deals herself up to 3 radiant damage. Fanatic deals 1 target X radiant damage, where X is the amount of damage dealt to Fanatic this turn.
Flavor Text: What you call a sacrifice, I consider a necessity.

Title: Sanctifying Strike
Game Text: Fanatic deals 1 target 2 melee damage. Draw 1 card. Fanatic regains 2 HP.
Flavor Text: The evil influence of this man has been lessened. The wounds he caused can begin to heal.

Title: Smite the Transgressor
Game Text: Fanatic deals 1 target 2 melee damage. Then, if Fanatic has 10 or fewer HP, use up to 2 powers.
Flavor Text: I am usually one to call for restraint, but now is hardly one of those times.

Title: Undaunted
Game Text: Whenever exactly 1 damage would be dealt to Fanatic, -1 to that damage. If Fanatic has 10 or fewer HP and would be dealt 5 or more damage, -3 to that damage.
Flavor Text: You took on nine gods by yourself. Will you not even take a moment to rest?!

Title: Wrathful Retribution
Game Text: START PHASE Fanatic deals 1 target X radiant damage, where X is Fanatic's maximum HP minus her current HP. Then, bury this card.
Flavor Text: You have been judged and found sorely wanting. Perish!

Title: Dance in the Fray
Game Text: After any of your Ongoing cards are destroyed, Haka deals 1 target 2 melee damage. POWER: Draw 1 card. Play 1 card.
Flavor Text: His boundless energy... almost as if he draws strength and vitality from beyond his own realm.

Title: Haka of Battle
Game Text: +1 damage dealt by Haka. START PHASE Discard any number of cards. Haka deals 1 target X melee damage, where X is the number of cards discarded this way plus 2. Then, destroy this card.
Flavor Text: Ka mate ka mate! Ka ora' ka ora'! Ka mate ka mate! Ka ora' ka ora'!

Title: Haka of Frenzy
Game Text: Damage dealt by Haka is irreducible. START PHASE Discard any number of cards. Haka deals X targets 3 melee damage each, where X is the number of cards discarded this way plus 1. Then, destroy this card.
Flavor Text: Some prepare for battle in quiet contemplation or prayer. Aata finds his strength in exultant expression.

Title: Haka of Recovery
Game Text: -1 damage dealt to Haka. START PHASE Discard any number of cards. Haka regains X HP, where X is the number of cards discarded this way times 2. Then, destroy this card.
Flavor Text: I know not how you do what you do, my friend, but I cannot deny the power in your songs and chants.
Attribution: The Argent Adept, Prime Wardens Vol. 1 #14

Title: Knock Heads
Game Text: After this card is played, Haka deals up to 2 targets 2 melee damage each. -1 damage dealt by those targets. START PHASE Destroy this card.
Flavor Text: I could have sworn he was right here. How could such a huge man have escaped my sight?

Title: Mere
Game Text: POWER: Haka deals 1 target 3 melee damage. Draw 1 card.
Flavor Text: This club is as much me as my fist or my leg. Let me show you!

Title: Rampage
Game Text: Haka deals each non-Hero target 5 melee damage and each Hero target 2 melee damage. Whenever Haka destroys a target with this damage, draw 1 card.
Flavor Text: I share no love for these robotic nuisances... but that was a bit much.

Title: Sudden Utu
Game Text: REACTION: Haka deals the attacker 2 melee damage.
Flavor Text: You are not nearly as fearsome as your namesake.

Title: Surge of Ihi
Game Text: Haka deals 1 target 2 melee damage. Draw 2 cards.
Flavor Text: True might comes from faith. I cannot ignore your strength, large man. But do not think it enough!
Attribution: Fanatic, Tome of the Bizarre Vol. 2 #200

Title: Ta Moko
Game Text: -1 damage dealt to Haka. DRAW PHASE You may draw 1 additional card this phase.
Flavor Text: These markings I wear on my face? I did them myself. With a sharp stick and snake venom. Your threats mean nothing to me.

Title: Taiaha
Game Text: POWER: Haka deal up to 2 targets 3 melee damage each. START PHASE You may destroy 1 Ongoing card. If you do, destroy this card.
Flavor Text: Using the taiaha is all about balance. It also helps to be stronger than everyone else.

Title: Taonga Mana
Game Text: After Haka destroys any non-Hero target, draw 1 card. START PHASE You may draw 3 cards. If you do, destroy this card.
Flavor Text: I have oft remarked upon your 'gentle giant' nature. I appreciate your ability to drop the 'gentle' part, at times.

Title: Tiaki Defender
Game Text: Whenever an ally would be dealt damage by a non-Hero target, you may redirect that damage to Haka. START PHASE Destroy this card.
Flavor Text: You've always inspired me to be a better hero. And now I owe you my life as well. Thank you, old friend.

Title: Bolster Allies
Game Text: Each Hero draws 1 card. 1 Hero other than you plays 1 card.
Flavor Text: We fight this day... for freedom!

Title: Bulletproof Skin
Game Text: -1 damage dealt to Legacy.
Flavor Text: He told me everything would be fine as the gunmen opened fire. And the bullets just ricocheted right off him!

Title: Danger Sense
Game Text: Legacy is immune to damage dealt by Environment targets. POWER: Bury 1 Environment target in play. Destroy this card.
Flavor Text: Too close! Too close for comfort.

Title: Dauntless Durability
Game Text: Whenever Legacy would be dealt 5 or more damage, prevent that damage and destroy this card. When this card is destroyed, Legacy regains 2 HP.
Flavor Text: You have crushed and despoiled your way across the galaxy, but the people of Earth will not be so easily broken!

Title: Flying Smash
Game Text: Legacy deals up to 3 targets 3 melee damage each.
Flavor Text: As you can see, we are untouch-- what was that?

Title: Heroic Interception
Game Text: After this card is played, Legacy deals himself 3 fixed melee damage. Your allies are immune to damage. START PHASE Destroy this card.
Flavor Text: Don't forget to calculate wind-speed and make sure you're approaching the projectile at the optimal angle to prevent-- Oh. He got it. OK.

Title: Inspiring Presence
Game Text: After this card is played, each ally regains 1 HP. +1 damage dealt by ally characters.
Flavor Text: For freedom, for liberty, for justice... for America!

Title: Keen Vision
Game Text: POWER: Reveal and replace the top card of 1 deck. If that deck belongs to an ally, they may draw 1 card or use 1 power.
Flavor Text: The truest sight is not of what's coming up over the horizon, but what's deep inside a person.

Title: Lead from the Front
Game Text: Whenever an ally would be dealt damage by a Villain target, you may redirect that damage to Legacy.
Flavor Text: I'd much rather follow a leader than follow orders.

Title: The Legacy Ring
Game Text: POWER PHASE You may use 1 additional power this phase.
Flavor Text: And now, just like the ring says, you too will be furthering your father's legacy.

Title: Motivational Charge
Game Text: POWER: Legacy deals 1 target 3 melee damage. Then, each of your allies regains 1 HP.
Flavor Text: About time. I was even starting to miss your idea of jokes!

Title: The Ol' One-Two
Game Text: Legacy deals 1 target 2 melee damage. Play 1 card.
Flavor Text: Square up, iron-chin! There's plenty of American spirit to go around!

Title: Take Down
Game Text: When a Villain card would be played, you may discard that card instead. If you do, the Villain target with the highest HP deals Legacy 2 energy damage. Then, destroy this card.
Flavor Text: Your injustices end here!

Title: Thokk!
Game Text: Legacy deals 1 target 5 melee damage.
Flavor Text: It's like looking into a mirror... but you're a poor reflection of the real thing!

Title: A True Hero
Game Text: Draw 2 cards. Each of your allies regains 1 HP.
Flavor Text: You all have what it takes to be a true hero, each and every day.

Title: Blazing Barrier
Game Text: REACTION: Ra deals the attacker 3 fire damage. Destroy this card.
Flavor Text: Do you think you can evaporate all of my form, puny little godling? Surely, your fire must run out eventually.
Attribution: Calypso, Ra: God of the Sun #1

Title: By Flame Reformed!
Game Text: Draw 1 card. Summon The Staff of Ra. You may play 1 card.
Flavor Text: From the fiery ether, return to me, my staff!
Attribution: Ra, Ra: God of the Sun #119

Title: Consuming Flame
Game Text: Ra deals up to 3 targets 2 fire damage each. For each target destroyed by this damage, draw 1 card.
Flavor Text: Fools, all of you. You thought to take my throne. Now, I release you to eternity!

Title: Excavation
Game Text: Bury up to 3 cards from the Environment Trash. Discover X Relic and/or Ongoing cards, where X is the number of cards buried this way.
Flavor Text: The Staff of Ra? Impossible! To have survived all these centuries...
Attribution: Dr. Blake Washington, Jr., Rebirth of Ra One-Shot

Title: Fiery Tornado
Game Text: After you use any power, Ra deals 1 target 1 fire damage. START PHASE Either discard 2 cards or destroy this card. END PHASE Ra deals up to 3 targets 1 fire damage each.
Flavor Text: It is well to cleanse the land with holy flame. Though, your flame has a long way to go before it can be considered anything truly divine.

Title: Fire Blast
Game Text: Ra deals 1 target 5 fire damage.
Flavor Text: Not even worth my time.
Attribution: Ra, Ra: God of the Sun #399

Title: Flame Spike
Game Text: Ra deals 1 target 1 fire damage. You may use 1 power.
Flavor Text: It's the wasting curse of the underworld. You have to convince Anubis to help me, Professor.

Title: Flesh of the Sun God
Game Text: Ra is immune to fire damage. POWER: Until your START PHASE, Hero characters are immune to fire damage.
Flavor Text: We shall see who holds the true ancient power of flame!

Title: Ignite
Game Text: POWER: Ra deals 1 target 3 fire damage.
Flavor Text: Your magicks will not save you, witch. Burn!
Attribution: Ra, Ra: God of the Sun #71

Title: Inferno
Game Text: Ra deals 1 target 3 fire damage. Ra deals each non-Hero target 1 fire damage each.
Flavor Text: Feel the all-engulfing might of the sun god!
Attribution: Ra, Ra: God of the Sun #139

Title: Living Conflagration
Game Text: When this card is destroyed, Ra deals 1 target 3 fire damage and draws 2 cards. POWER: Destroy this card. START PHASE Ra deals up to 3 targets 1 fire damage each.
Flavor Text: Your ka and your ba, they burn brightly. You can surely part with some of the fire within you to regain the power of flame...
Attribution: Ammit, Ra: Horus of Two Horizons One-Shot

Title: Scorched Earth
Game Text: Destroy 1 Environment card. Ra deals each non-Hero target 1 fire damage.
Flavor Text: The sands of the Sahara are glass in my wake!
Attribution: Ra, Tome of the Bizarre Vol. 2 #271

Title: Solar Flare
Game Text: +2 damage dealt by Ra. START PHASE Either destroy this card or Ra deals himself 5 fixed psychic damage.
Flavor Text: As it happens, when you play with fire...
Attribution: Ra, Ra: God of the Sun #250

Title: The Staff of Ra
Game Text: +1 damage dealt by Ra. Whenever Ra would deal fire damage to a target, you may double the damage dealt after applying all other modifiers. After you do, destroy this card.
Flavor Text: With power from the ancients, I am Ra: god of the sun!

Title: Accelerated Assault
Game Text: Tachyon deals each non-Hero target 1 melee damage.
Flavor Text: And you! And you! And you! And you! Whew! Did I forget anyone?

Title: Blinding Speed
Game Text: Destroy 1 Ongoing card.
Flavor Text: My hero! We must stop meeting this way.

Title: Expedited Efficiency
Game Text: Draw 1 card. Play up to 2 cards.
Flavor Text: ... these readings are all over the place... an additional 23.5% should do it... going to have to test it in a frictionless environment... need to pick up pasta on the way home... if we could induce a myopic state... whew, what a busy morning!

Title: Fleet of Foot
Game Text: Each Hero may draw 1 card. You may play 1 card.
Flavor Text: You were always holding me back. Now, nothing can stop me!

Title: HUD Goggles
Game Text: Damage dealt by Tachyon is irreducible. PLAY PHASE You may play 1 additional card this phase.
Flavor Text: Diagnostic info, streaming updates from the team, plus it keeps the bugs out of my eyes at Mach 8.

Title: Hypersonic Dash
Game Text: After this card is played, Tachyon deals each non-Hero target 1 sonic damage. Targets dealt damage this way cannot deal damage. START PHASE Destroy this card.
Flavor Text: Sparks! Is there a way to do that without the painfully loud noise?

Title: Lightspeed Barrage
Game Text: Tachyon deals 1 target X melee damage, where X is the number of cards in your trash. Shuffle your trash into your deck.
Flavor Text: 10 seconds ago, I was in a different time zone. Guess how many times I'm going to hit you in the next 10 seconds.

Title: Nimble Strike
Game Text: Tachyon deals 1 target 2 melee damage. You may draw 1 card.
Flavor Text: Nothing like a little percussive investigation!

Title: Pushing the Limits
Game Text: POWER: Tachyon deals 1 target 3 melee damage. Destroy this card. START PHASE Tachyon deals herself 2 fixed fire damage. PLAY PHASE You may play 1 additional card this phase. DRAW PHASE You may draw 1 additional card this phase.
Flavor Text: If she keeps going at such impossible speeds, she might destroy herself... she might destroy us all!

Title: Quick Insight
Game Text: Draw 3 cards. Discard 2 cards.
Flavor Text: Hmm hmm hmm... I hate to say it, but I'm impressed.

Title: Research Grant
Game Text: POWER: Draw up to 3 cards. Then, discard 1 card.
Flavor Text: Doc's still in the lab. Been in there for days. Hardly even comes out to eat or sleep. I've never seen her happier.

Title: Sonic Vortex
Game Text: Tachyon deals up to X targets 3 sonic damage each, where X is the number of cards in your trash.
Flavor Text: When she gets all serious and no-nonsense, her intensity is actually kinda scary.

Title: Sucker Punch
Game Text: Tachyon deals 1 target 1 melee damage. Then, if that target has 2 or fewer HP, destroy that target.
Flavor Text: Thought you had me, didn't you?

Title: Synaptic Interrupt
Game Text: REACTION: Draw 1 card or play 1 card. If you play a card this way, destroy this card.
Flavor Text: Hey! Careful where you point that thing!

Title: Alien Weather Patterns
Game Text: You may shuffle your trash into your deck. Discover 3 Weather cards.
Flavor Text: These skies are so different from Dok'Thorath. Are they like or unlike those from your-- ah, er. Oh... I am sorry.

Title: Atlantean StormBlade
Game Text: After any Weather card is destroyed, Tempest deals 1 target 1 lightning damage. POWER: Tempest deals 1 target 3 irreducible lightning damage. Then, destroy 1 Weather card.
Flavor Text: You too have found power beyond what we brought from Vognild Prime. There is strength in this place... strength ripe for our taking!

Title: Ball Lightning
Game Text: You may destroy 1 Ongoing card. Tempest deals 1 target 3 lightning damage.
Flavor Text: The polarizing power of electricity can produce many interesting results.

Title: Chain Lightning
Game Text: Discover 1 Weather card. Tempest deals up to X targets 3 lightning damage each, where X is the number of Weather cards in play plus 1.
Flavor Text: I will let nothing stop me from saving as many Maerynians as I can find. And you're in my way.

Title: Displaced Ambassador
Game Text: Reveal the top card of each Hero deck. Replace any non-Item cards revealed this way. Play any Item cards revealed this way. Each Hero draws 1 card.
Flavor Text: Welcome to this planet we call Earth. It is an honor to meet you, Mr. Dalton.
Attribution: Legacy, Stranger in a Strange World #3

Title: Electrical Storm
Game Text: +1 lightning damage dealt by Tempest. START PHASE Tempest deals up to 3 targets 1 lightning damage each. Either discard 1 card or destroy this card.
Flavor Text: Your circuits are live with electricity. Surely they won't mind a bit more!

Title: Flash Flood Warning
Game Text: START PHASE Destroy up to 2 Environment cards. If you destroy any Environment cards this way, destroy this card.
Flavor Text: Keep your heads up, chaps! We'll all be burnt to a crisp if there's not some form of timely intervention!

Title: Gift of Val'Maera
Game Text: POWER: Each Hero character regains 2 HP.
Flavor Text: This rain restores more than the body. This must be the energy you spoke of, friend!

Title: Grievous Hailstorm
Game Text: POWER: Tempest deals each non-Hero target 2 cold damage.
Flavor Text: All ships, reverse thrusters, full power! Get us out of this accursed atmosphere!
Attribution: Grand Warlord Voss, Cosmic Tales Vol. 1 300

Title: Lightning Slash
Game Text: Discover 1 Weather card. Tempest deals 1 target X lightning damage, where X is the number of Weather cards in play plus 1.
Flavor Text: Never again! You and your kind will never descend upon another world to pick it clean. Your campaign of terror ends here!

Title: Localized Hurricane
Game Text: START PHASE Tempest deals up to 4 targets 3 projectile damage each. END PHASE Either destroy this card or Tempest deals the 2 Hero targets with the highest HP 1 fixed projectile damage each.
Flavor Text: The eye of the storm is a place of great power, and of great risk.
Attribution: The Argent Adept, Prime Wardens Vol. 2 #13

Title: Maerynian Aquaculturist
Game Text: After you play any Weather card, you may draw 1 card. POWER: Reveal the top card of the Environment deck. Replace it or discard it. Draw 1 card.
Flavor Text: The coral that grows in the oceans of this planet can be convinced to form structures of impressive size.

Title: Reclaim From the Deep
Game Text: Each Hero may salvage 1 Ongoing or Item card. Collect 1 Ongoing or Item card.
Flavor Text: This blade is aligned with the latent energy housed in the air itself. I could use it as a focus for my lightning. In fact, I'll do just that.

Title: Rolling Fog
Game Text: START PHASE Either discard 1 card or destroy this card. END PHASE Destroy up to 2 targets with 2 or fewer HP. Draw 1 card for each target destroyed this way.
Flavor Text: They are the hunters of men. Bloodsuckers. Fiends. They will not expect to become the hunted.

Title: Shielding Winds
Game Text: -X damage dealt to Hero targets, where X is the number of Weather cards in play. START PHASE Destroy this card.
Flavor Text: Effective. Not the sort of shielding I have any experience with, but don't consider that a complaint.

Title: Thunderclap
Game Text: After this card is played, Tempest deals 1 target 3 lightning damage. When this card is destroyed, Tempest deals up to 3 targets 2 sonic damage each. START PHASE You may destroy this card.
Flavor Text: Thorathian soldiers are all the same. Trained to be weapons, but not particularly bright ones.

Title: Arsenal Bot
Game Text: This card cannot be played during your PLAY PHASE. END PHASE This card deals up to 2 targets 2 projectile damage each.
Flavor Text: BUDDA BUDDA BUDDA.

Title: Bee Bot
Game Text: This card cannot be played during your PLAY PHASE. When this card is destroyed, you may destroy 1 Ongoing card. Then, Unity deals 1 target 2 projectile damage.
Flavor Text: I know it's more like a hornet, Dr. Boring, but Bee Bot is more fun to say!

Title: Brainstorm
Game Text: Draw 3 cards. Unity deals up to 3 targets 1 lightning damage each.
Flavor Text: The stuff I make up is way better than most actual facts.

Title: Champion Bot
Game Text: This card cannot be played during your PLAY PHASE. +1 damage dealt by Unity and Mechanical Golem cards.
Flavor Text: Let's go save the world, Champion Bot!

Title: Construction Pylon
Game Text: POWER: Play up to 2 Mechanical Golem cards. Then, destroy this card.
Flavor Text: See, you can do anything that you put your mind to! Quite literally in your case!

Title: Cryo Bot
Game Text: This card cannot be played during your PLAY PHASE. After this card is dealt fire damage, it deals 1 target that much cold damage. END PHASE This card deals up to 3 targets 1 cold damage each.
Flavor Text: Don't be sad, Cryo Bot! Everyone loves you!

Title: Flash Forge
Game Text: POWER: Unity deals herself 1 fixed psychic damage. Each Mechanical Golem card regains 1 HP. Either discover 1 Mechanical Golem card or discover 1 Item card.
Flavor Text: Eek! I need some help here! Time to make a new friend!

Title: Hasty Augmentation
Game Text: 1 Hero may use 1 power. +2 to damage dealt by that Hero with that power.
Flavor Text:
Hey! Direct control of targeting? Now that's what I'm talking about!	Benchmark, Revocorp Presents #35	2	Core Game	Unity
Unity	Inspired Repair	-	One-Shot	Draw 1 card. Each Mechanical Golem card regains 3 HP. Play 1 card.	You call them your friends, but you are enslaving living metal for your purposes! Cease your-- Hey, wait. Stop that. Stop fixing them!"

Title: Modular Workbench
Game Text: POWER: Play 1 card. If that card is not a Mechanical Golem card, draw 1 card.
Flavor Text: Of course I built it myself! I mean, Tacky helped... but still!

Title: Platform Bot
Game Text: This card cannot be played during your PLAY PHASE. -1 damage dealt to this card. END PHASE This card deals 1 target 3 energy damage.
Flavor Text: Pew pew! Lasers! Just like the real thing, right?

Title: Powered Shock Wave
Game Text: Unity deals each non-Hero target X lightning damage, where X is the number of Mechanical Golem cards in play.
Flavor Text: Argh! That actually hurt me! You can make lightning, too? Not fair!

Title: Raptor Bot
Game Text: This card cannot be played during your PLAY PHASE. END PHASE This card deals 1 target X melee damage, where X is the number of Mechanical Golem cards in play.
Flavor Text: Hi there, Mr. Chomps! Where are all your friends?

Title: Robot Reclamation
Game Text: Salvage up to 3 Mechanical Golem cards.
Flavor Text: Inquiry: With focus and motivation, could your capabilities extend to altering my form?

Title: Scrap Metal
Game Text: After any Mechanical Golem card is destroyed, you may put it in your hand. If you do, destroy this card. START PHASE You may play 1 card. If you do, destroy this card.
Flavor Text: Yeah, you're right, Champ. It's been a long day.

Title: Stealth Bot
Game Text: This card cannot be played during your PLAY PHASE. -1 damage dealt to this card. Whenever Unity or a Mechanical Golem card would be dealt damage, you may redirect it to this card.
Flavor Text: So sneaky! Go get 'em!

Title: Supply Crate
Game Text: After this card is played, draw 1 card. START PHASE You may draw 2 cards. If you do, destroy this card.
Flavor Text: Don't mind me. Gotta bring in just a few boxes of, uh, important metal... things.

Title: Swift Bot
Game Text: This card cannot be played during your PLAY PHASE. PLAY PHASE You may play 1 additional card this phase. DRAW PHASE You may draw 1 additional card this phase.
Flavor Text: I am uptight about science and hate explosions in the lab.

Title: Volatile Parts
Game Text: After any Mechanical Golem card is destroyed, Unity deals the non-Hero target with the lowest HP 2 fire damage.
Flavor Text: What? Don't look at me that way! Look, I can always rebuild you.

Title: Abduct and Interrogate
Game Text: The Wraith deals 1 non-Hero target 1 toxic damage. If that target is destroyed, reveal the top card of each deck. You may discard any revealed cards. Play the other revealed cards.
Flavor Text: If we're being completely honest, I would rather you didn't tell me how you got this information.

Title: Combat Prowess
Game Text: REACTION: -2 to the damage The Wraith would be dealt. If The Wraith takes no damage as a result, you may play 1 card.
Flavor Text: For someone with such... shoddy form, you know your way around a fight.

Title: Flashbang Projector
Game Text: POWER: Put 1 non-character Villain target in play back on top of the Villain deck. Destroy this card.
Flavor Text: I used similar technology in the Army for infiltration and extractions. Worse, but similar.

Title: Grappling Hook
Game Text: Destroy 1 Ongoing card. You may draw 1 card or play 1 card.
Flavor Text: Silent, unexpected... What can I say? I like to travel in style.

Title: Impromptu Invention
Game Text: Draw 1 card. Discover 1 Item card. You may play 1 card.
Flavor Text: This... wasn't at all what I intended to build.

Title: Infrared Eyepiece
Game Text: POWER: Reveal the top card of the Villain deck. Replace it or discard it. Then, draw 1 card.
Flavor Text: Hunting your prey through walls... It almost feels like cheating. Almost.

Title: Inventory Barrage
Game Text: Discard any number of Item cards. The Wraith deals 1 target X projectile damage, where X is the number of cards discarded this way times 2.
Flavor Text: Don't like getting pelted with sharp objects? You're not going to enjoy the next few moments.

Title: Leverage
Game Text: Draw 4 cards. Collect 1 card.
Flavor Text: I have to say, I'm surprised at how easy to talk to you are! I feel like I've known you my whole life.

Title: Micro Targeting Computer
Game Text: +2 projectile damage dealt by The Wraith.
Flavor Text: Weather reports, a stock ticker, seamless connectivity to the World Wide Web... and yes, it also makes it easier to shoot the bad guys.

Title: Razor Ordnance
Game Text: POWER: The Wraith deals 1 target 3 projectile damage.
Flavor Text: These nano-polymerized blades can cut through that robot's plating, provided I get just the right angle!

Title: Smoke Bombs
Game Text: -1 damage dealt to Hero targets. +1 damage dealt by The Wraith. START PHASE Destroy this card.
Flavor Text: You think some smoke can stop me? You can't hide from me. I've got you right where I want you!

Title: Sonic Neutralizer
Game Text: POWER: Select 1 Environment card in play. Until your START PHASE, that card has no game text.
Flavor Text: Cover your ears! My sonic stopper is effective, but it doesn't pick and choose who can hear it!

Title: Stun Bolt
Game Text: POWER: The Wraith deals 1 target 1 lightning damage. Until your START PHASE, -1 damage dealt by that target.
Flavor Text: For once, I thought I had her. I thought she was finally out of tricks. But she never did play fair.

Title: Suture Self
Game Text: The Wraith regains 2 HP. Salvage 1 Item card.
Flavor Text: Just another day in paradise.
Attribution: The Wraith, A Day in the Life: The Wraith

Title: Throwing Knives
Game Text: POWER: The Wraith deals up to 3 targets 1 projectile damage each.
Flavor Text: I thought I was cold, but you're downright merciless!

Title: Utility Belt
Game Text: POWER: Either draw 2 cards or play 1 Item card. POWER PHASE You may use 1 additional power this phase.
Flavor Text: Being prepared is all about having the right tool for the job.
